title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: Blockchain and non-banking finance firms have taken over the world by storm. According to a recent study by LinkedIn and the crypto trading app OKX, it is estimated that the number of people working in the blockchain space has shot up by 76%, further creating a significant gap in the demand for technical talent.Every year with such a high number of people and organizations getting involved in the blockchain business, the need for understanding well-planned ways to raise capital for Blockchain projects is only becoming more important. AdLunam not only set on helping Blockchain project owners grow capital through their IDO platform but is also helping aspiring blockchain business owners build their own Blockchain projects all from scratch.Learn more about AdLunam here: https://adlunam.cc

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: The rise of cryptos has also attracted a plethora of investors, leading to even more innovations in the crypto industry. These innovations are now accelerating the acceptance of cryptocurrencies and other decentralised projects. If you're keen to discuss about Decentralized production, Metaverse, NFTs & more, then join AdLunam CEO Nadja Bester and Eddy Huang, Founder & CEO of Crazy Meta on Aug 30.When: 30th August, 3:00PM CET Join them here: https://t.co/R5Lsp8MtBT

comments.author: ANKIT007
comments.body: I believe the next biggest crypto gains are going to be in IDOs hence keeping track of the best launchpads is a part of the entire circle. I am hence dedicating my time in crypto to solely looking for the best opportunities to maximize my gains and get associated with the most fundamentally solid projects. AdLunam is not only set on helping Blockchain project owners grow capital through their IDO platform but is also helping aspiring blockchain business owners build their own Blockchain projects all from scratch.
